languages.text: {n}Внимательный взгляд темных глаз впивается в ваше лицо.{/n} "Начинай спрашивать. Я решу, какой вопрос достоин ответа".
{n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."
languages.original_text: {n}Внимательный взгляд темных глаз впивается в ваше лицо.{/n} "Начинай спрашивать. Я решу, какой вопрос достоин ответа".

traits.locale_text: {n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sus ojos oscuros y devoradores brillan con interés.{/n} «Haz tus preguntas y decidiré cuáles merecen respuesta».
languages.original_text: {n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus ojos oscuros y devoradores brillan con interés.{/n} «Haz tus preguntas y decidiré cuáles merecen respuesta».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋噬人的黑眼睛闪烁着充满兴趣的光芒。{/n}“尽管问吧。至于哪些问题值得回答，由我说了算。”
languages.original_text: {n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋噬人的黑眼睛闪烁着充满兴趣的光芒。{/n}“尽管问吧。至于哪些问题值得回答，由我说了算。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}貪欲な暗い瞳が興味深げに光る。{/n}「何が知りたい？答えるだけの価値があるかどうか、俺が判断してやろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}貪欲な暗い瞳が興味深げに光る。{/n}「何が知りたい？答えるだけの価値があるかどうか、俺が判断してやろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une lueur d'intérêt embrase ses yeux sombres et avides.{/n} « Posez vos questions. Je verrai bien si elles méritent une réponse. »
languages.original_text: {n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une lueur d'intérêt embrase ses yeux sombres et avides.{/n} « Posez vos questions. Je verrai bien si elles méritent une réponse. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die dunklen, alles verschlingenden Augen strahlen vor Interesse.{/n} "Stellt Eure Fragen. Ich werde entscheiden, welche davon einer Antwort würdig sind."
languages.original_text: {n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die dunklen, alles verschlingenden Augen strahlen vor Interesse.{/n} "Stellt Eure Fragen. Ich werde entscheiden, welche davon einer Antwort würdig sind."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."

languages.text: {n}Karanlık, derin gözleri ilgiyle ışıldıyor.{/n} "Sen soracağını sor... Cevaba layık mı değil mi, bakarız."
languages.original_text: {n}The dark, devouring eyes gleam with interest.{/n} "Ask your questions. I will decide which is worthy of an answer."
